{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3551816,"name":"Thomas "Owen" Mattarocchia","username":"Apollo-11","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/apollo-11/{size}/263781_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-09T13:15:27.569Z","cooked":"

Hello chief delphi! My team recently bought some arducams. Only problem being that we needed protection for the camera, and after a little bit of looking found 3206’s camera protection (thanks 3206!) and made a mount that goes to the back of it.

PXL_20250309_124025357.PORTRAIT1920×2557 347 KB

PXL_20250309_124019119.PORTRAIT1920×2557 319 KB

PXL_20250309_124009746.PORTRAIT1920×2557 355 KB

drive.google.com

Camera Mount.zip

Google Drive file.

Please print all covers in the assembly
